valueSetListItems.itemDescription: Dismissal of employee due to the permanent invalidity declaration
Dismissal of probationary employee upon request by the employer
Dismissal of probationary cooperative members by agreement of the Governing Council.
Dismissal of probationary employee upon request by the employee
Termination by employer by senior management
End Temporary Contract upon request by the employer
End of a temporary contract  upon request by the employee
End of temporary administrative relationship of employment officers and administratives
Collective dismissal or expiration of work contract by Statutory Lay-off proceedings (ERE)
Contract suspension by Statutory lay-off proceedings (ERE)
Temporary reduced working-hours by Statutory Lay-off proceedings (ERE)
Voluntary suspension of employment relationship. Victim of gender-based violence
Termination or involuntary dismissal from the commitments of the Armed Forces.
End of artistic activity without end of contract
End of fixed activity of discontinuous periodical contract
Involuntary resignation due to public office or trade union
Special involuntary and permanent leave for exclusive or partial dedication to public or union busin
Completion of the service or maximum time period as reservist in the Armed Forces
Dismissal due to objective causes: inadequacy, lack of  attendance at work and adaptation
Termination by employee due to modification of substantial working conditions.
Voluntary termination of the employment relationship. Victim of gender-based violence.
Contract resolution due to fair cause

/worker/workAssignment/customFieldGroup/.longLabelName: Indicates when any contract work ends for the job role.

/worker/workAssignment/customFieldGroup/.shortLabelName: EEAUTOGENREGIND, Close Previous Job(s), Covering Position, Suspend Timesheets, Assign to Work Pattern, Irregularpaymentpattern
/worker/workAssignment/customFieldGroup/.longLabelName: EEAUTOGENREGIND, Indicates whether previous job records should be closed (i.e. given an end date).  When set to ‘Yes’ this field will indicate to the system to close the previous job records and on completion of this will be reset to ‘No’., Indicates if the employee will be covering an existing position by performing this job role (i.e. for temporary workers)., Suspend Timesheets, WPUSEWORKPATTERN, Irregularpaymentpattern

/worker/workAssignment/customFieldGroup/.shortLabelName: Ordinary Hours per Day, Contracted Hours, Days Per Year, Hours Per Pay Period
/worker/workAssignment/customFieldGroup/.longLabelName: WPORDINARYHOURSPERDAY, WPCONTRACTEDHOURS, DAYSPERYEAR, The hours that the employee works for the pay per period selected.  This value is transferred to ADP Freedom and used in calculating pay for an employee.    This is a mandatory field.
Additional notes regarding this job role., Companyname

/worker/workAssignment/exitNoticeDuratio.longLabelName: Records Notice Period of the person

/worker/workAssignment/expectedStartDate.longLabelName: The date the job becomes effective for the employee.  This field is mandatory.

/worker/workAssignment/hireDate.shortLabelName: Effective From, Effective Status, Date of Join, Date of Join
/worker/workAssignment/hireDate.longLabelName: Payroll Profile Effective From, Used by the system to indicate if the record is current, future or historical, The date on which the employee joined., Records Date of Join of the person

/worker/workAssignment/jobCode.longLabelName: References the post / job role that the employee is carrying out.

/worker/workAssignment/jobTitle.longLabelName: A personalised title for the employee’s job, normally the same as the Post’s job title.    When a job title (post) has been selected and no personal job title has been provided then the personal job title will be given the title from the post.    This field is mandatory.

/worker/workAssignment/payrollFileNumber.longLabelName: The employee’s new Employee Code.  This will change when the employee is rehired.  Validation will be carried out to ensure that the value given is unique within the system.  , The employee’s new Employee Code.  This will change when the employee is rehired.  This will match the most recent Employee Code defined in the Employment History table

/worker/workAssignment/primaryIndicator.longLabelName: Indicates whether the job is the primary job role that will be sent to payroll. For example, if the employee has multiple concurrent jobs only one is sent.  When set to ‘Yes’ the system will enforce that all other effective job records are set to ‘No’ i.e. there can only be one primary job at any given time.

/worker/workAssignment/workLevelCode/cod.longLabelName: Indicates if the employee is a full or part-time worker in the job role.  This field is mandatory.

/worker/workerDates/originalHireDate.longLabelName: A new field that indicates when the employee service should continue from if they are re-hired.

/worker/workerID/idValue.shortLabelName: Reference Number, Status, User Creation Decision
/worker/workerID/idValue.longLabelName: Records Reference Number of the person, Records Status of persons employment, User Creation Decision
